News.Title: New Pink Givenchy Lip Gloss Tip On
News.Text: Please ensure you all order the Pink Givenchy lip gloss tip on for June edition of "Women's Beauty" magazine

News.Title: Training On The New System
News.Text: Training for the new system is running on Monday 11th June at 10am with Alison form Transworld. Please meet in the boardroom if you wish to attend.
